ticket.title: match only appends first parent resource to generated path function
ticket.original-body:
Here's an example of a config.rb: http://pastie.org/1553845 (put on pastie cause couldn't format it to appear here)
Then I run "rake routes | grep monthly"
account_monthly_schedule /user/:user_id/account/:account_id/schedule/monthly/:day/:month/:year
Expected:
user_account_monthly_schedule /user/:user_id/account/:account_id/schedule/monthly/:day/:month/:year
